name: iocControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom”
”Set bedroom to heat”
”Alexa, Set bedroom to 21 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With iocControl assistant you can turn your AC on/off, change temperatures, change modes of operation and change fan speeds. To activate iocControl, you must have your AC system connected to the CoolAutomation Cloud. 
Further info can be found under www.coolautomation.com

List of commands:
Example for toggle
• Alexa, turn on bedroom
• Alexa, turn off bedroom

Example for Mode control (heat, cool, auto )
• Set bedroom to heat

Example for Temperature control
• Alexa, Set bedroom to 21 degrees
• Alexa, decrease the bedrooms temperature by 3 degrees
• Increase the bedroom temperature
• Decrease the bedroom temperature
• Make bedroom warmer
• Make bedroom cooler


Examples for querying air conditioner state
• Is bedroom set to heat?
• What is the bedroom thermostat set to?
• What temperature is bedroom set to?
